---
title: "montecarlosolve"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
white1 = c(0:10)
black1 = c(0:10)

df <- expand_grid(white1, black1)

df |>
  mutate(white2 = 10-white1) |>
  mutate(black2 = 10-black1) |>
  mutate(expected_survival = 0.5*(white1/(white1+black1)) + 0.5*((white2)/(white2 + black2))) |>
  mutate(expected_survival = if_else(is.na(expected_survival), 0.5, expected_survival)) |>
  filter(expected_survival == max(expected_survival))


```
